alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Ozaukee; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 10:48PM CDT until July 23 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ozaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1048 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near West Bend to near Hartford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... West Bend, Mequon, Hartford, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Jackson, Slinger, Saukville, Kewaskum, Thiensville, Germantown, Fredonia, Newburg, Richfield, Addison, Ashippun, Rubicon, Neosho and Waubeka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
